00017 //Called once to set up the GL context, link shaders, initialize UI, set up Camera.
00018 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 NGLDraw::NGLDraw(int _width, int _height)
00020 {
00021 
00022   m_patrolColour = ngl::Colour(0.0f, 0.25f, 0.6f);
00023   m_defensiveColour = ngl::Colour(0.5f, 0.4f, 0.5f);
00024   m_aggressiveColour = ngl::Colour(0.3f, 0.0f, 0.2f);
00025   m_wallColour = ngl::Colour(0.3f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
00026   //Mouse rotation values
00027   m_rotate=false;
00028   m_spinXFace=0;
00029   m_spinYFace=0;
00030 
00031   // Grey Background
00032   // enable depth testing for drawing
00033   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00034 
00035 
00036    // now to load the shader and set the values
00037   // grab an instance of shader manager
00038   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00039   // we are creating a shader called Phong
00040   shader->createShaderProgram("Phong");
00041   // now we are going to create empty shaders for Frag and Vert
00042   shader->attachShader("PhongVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00043   shader->attachShader("PhongFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00044   // attach the source
00045   shader->loadShaderSource("PhongVertex","shaders/PhongVertex.glsl");
00046   shader->loadShaderSource("PhongFragment","shaders/PhongFragment.glsl");
00047   // compile the shaders
00048   shader->compileShader("PhongVertex");
00049   shader->compileShader("PhongFragment");
00050   // add them to the program
00051   shader->attachShaderToProgram("Phong","PhongVertex");
00052   shader->attachShaderToProgram("Phong","PhongFragment");
00053   // now bind the shader attributes for most NGL primitives we use the following
00054   // layout attribute 0 is the vertex data (x,y,z)1
00055   shader->bindAttribute("Phong",0,"inVert");
00056   // attribute 1 is the UV data u,v (if present)
00057   shader->bindAttribute("Phong",1,"inUV");
00058   // attribute 2 are the normals x,y,z
00059   shader->bindAttribute("Phong",2,"inNormal");
00060 
00061   // now we have associated this data we can link the shader
00062   shader->linkProgramObject("Phong");
00063   // and make it active ready to load values
00064   (*shader)["Phong"]->use();
00065   // the shader will use the currently active material and light0 so set them
00066   ngl::Material m(ngl::POLISHEDSILVER);
00067   // load our material values to the shader into the structure material (see Vertex shader)
00068   m.loadToShader("material");
00069 
00070   // Now we will create a basic Camera from the graphics library
00071   // This is a static camera so it only needs to be set once
00072   // First create Values for the camera position
00073   ngl::Vec3 from(0,cameraHeight,0);
00074   ngl::Vec3 to(0,0,0);
00075   ngl::Vec3 up(0,0,-1);
00076   // now load to our new camera
00077   m_cam= new ngl::Camera(from,to,up);
00078   // set the shape using FOV 45 Aspect Ratio based on Width and Height
00079   // The final two are near and far clipping planes of 0.5 and 10
00080 
00081   m_cam->setShape(45,(float)m_width/m_height,0.05,350);
00082   shader->setShaderParam3f("viewerPos",m_cam->getEye().m_x,m_cam->getEye().m_y,m_cam->getEye().m_z);
00083   // now create our light this is done after the camera so we can pass the
00084   // transpose of the projection matrix to the light to do correct eye space
00085   // transformations
00086   ngl::Mat4 iv=m_cam->getVPMatrix();
00087   iv.transpose();
00088   m_light = new ngl::Light(ngl::Vec3(-20,0,0),ngl::Colour(0.3,0.3,0.4,1),ngl::Colour(1,1,1,1),ngl::POINTLIGHT );
00089   m_light->setPosition(ngl::Vec3(0,20,50));
00090   //m_light->setTransform(iv);
00091   // load these values to the shader as well
00092   m_light->loadToShader("light");
00093 
00094 
00095   //SPOT LIGHT:
00096   m_spot = ngl::SpotLight(ngl::Vec3(0,0,0),
00097            ngl::Vec3(0,1,0),ngl::Colour(0.5,0.4,0.4));
00098   m_spot.aim(ngl::Vec4(0,10,0));
00099   m_spot.setSpecColour(ngl::Colour(0.4,0.4,0.1,1));
00100   m_spot.setCutoff(15);
00101   m_spot.setInnerCutoff(10);
00102   m_spot.setExponent(2+1);
00103   m_spot.setAttenuation(1.0,0.0,0.0);
00104   m_spot.enable();
00105   m_spot.setTransform(iv);
00106   m_spot.loadToShader("spotLight");
00107 
00108 
00109 
00110   m_width = _width;
00111   m_height = _height;
00112 
00113   m_gameState = gameMenu;
00114 
00115   //Create new instance of entity manager.
00116   m_entityMgr = new EntityManager();
00117 
00118   initialiseUI();
00119   m_selectedLevel = 1;
00120 
00121   //Set Squad Circular indicator colour.
00122   m_squadCurrentColour =ngl::Colour(0.0f,0.5f,0.5f,1.0f);
00123 
00124 }

00128 NGLDraw::~NGLDraw()
00129 {
00130   delete m_entityMgr;
00131   ngl::NGLInit *Init = ngl::NGLInit::instance();
00132   std::cout<<"Shutting down NGL, removing VAO's and Shaders\n";
00133   delete m_light;
00134   delete m_cam;
00135   delete m_buttonPlay;
00136   delete m_buttonLevel1;
00137   delete m_buttonLevel2;
00138   delete m_buttonLevel3;
00139   delete m_buttonLevel4;

00149 }

00151 //Resize viewport to desired width and height, distorting the camera image accordingly.
00152 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 void NGLDraw::resize(int _w, int _h)
00154 {
00155   glViewport(0,0,_w,_h);
00156 
00157   m_height = _h;
00158   m_width = _w;
00159 
00160   m_longestSide = _h;
00161   if (_w > _h)
00162   {
00163       m_longestSide = _w;
00164   }
00165 
00166   // now set the camera size values as the screen size has changed
00167   m_cam->setShape(45,(float)_w/_h,0.05,350);
00168 
00169   //Distort UI buttons
00170   unsigned int numberOfButtons = m_buttons.size();
00171   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfButtons; i++)
00172   {
00173     m_buttons[i]->setWindowDimensions(ngl::Vec2(m_width, m_height));
00174   }
00175   m_sliderSquadSize->setWindowDimensions(ngl::Vec2(m_width, m_height));
00176 
00177   m_textSmall->setScreenSize(_w, _h);
00178   m_textMedium->setScreenSize(_w, _h);
00179   //Distort scrren text
00180   SDL_Rect s;
00181   SDL_GetDisplayBounds(0,&s);
00182   float x,y;
00183   // now get a scale transform for the text shader
00184   x=1.0-float(s.w-_w)/s.w;
00185   y=1.0-float(s.h-_h)/s.h;
00186   // now set the new transform element for this shader
00187   m_textSmall->setTransform(x, y);
00188   m_textMedium->setTransform(x, y);
00189 }

00202     ngl::Vec3 to(0,0,0);
00203     ngl::Vec3 up(0,0,-1);
00204 
00205     m_cam = new ngl::Camera(from,to,up);
00206     m_cam->setShape(45,(float)m_width/m_height,0.05,50);
00207 
00208     m_mouseGlobalTX = ngl::Mat4();
00209     m_modelPos = ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00210 
00211 }

00255       rotY.rotateY(m_spinYFace);
00256       // multiply the rotations
00257       m_mouseGlobalTX=rotY*rotX;
00258       // add the translations
00259       m_mouseGlobalTX.m_m[3][0] = m_modelPos.m_x;
00260       m_mouseGlobalTX.m_m[3][1] = m_modelPos.m_y;
00261       m_mouseGlobalTX.m_m[3][2] = m_modelPos.m_z;

00271

00273         {
00274            m_selectedSquad->setSquadDrawColour(m_squadCurrentColour);
00275         }

00284

00300             break;

00491 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00492 void NGLDraw::update(double _timeElapsed, double _currentTime)
00493 {

00496 
00497 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00498 void NGLDraw::loadMatricesToShader()
00499 {
00500   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00501 
00502   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00503   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00504   ngl::Mat3 normalMatrix;
00505   ngl::Mat4 M;
00506   M=m_trans.getMatrix()*m_mouseGlobalTX;
00507   MV=  M*m_cam->getViewMatrix();
00508   MVP= M*m_cam->getVPMatrix();
00509   normalMatrix=MV;
00510   normalMatrix.inverse();
00511   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MV",MV);
00512   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00513   shader->setShaderParamFromMat3("normalMatrix",normalMatrix);
00514   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("M",M);
00515 }
00516 
00517 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00518 void NGLDraw::mouseMoveEvent (const SDL_MouseMotionEvent &_event)
00519 {
00520 
00521   // right mouse translate code
00522   if(m_translate && _event.state &SDL_BUTTON_MMASK)
00523   {
00524     int diffX = (int)(_event.x - m_origXPos);
00525     int diffZ = (int)(_event.y - m_origYPos);
00526     m_origXPos=_event.x;
00527     m_origYPos=_event.y;
00528 
00529     m_cam->move(INCREMENT * (abs(m_modelPos.m_y-cameraHeight+1)*0.05) * diffX,0,INCREMENT * (abs(m_modelPos.m_y-cameraHeight+1)*0.05) * diffZ);
00530     float cameraLimitX = (m_gameworld->getCellGraph()->getMapBounds()[1]);
00531     float cameraLimitZ = (m_gameworld->getCellGraph()->getMapBounds()[3]);
00532     if(m_cam->getEye().m_x> cameraLimitX)
00533     {
00534         m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec3(cameraLimitX,m_cam->getEye().m_y,m_cam->getEye().m_z));
00535     }
00536     if(m_cam->getEye().m_x< -cameraLimitX)
00537     {
00538         m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec3(-cameraLimitX,m_cam->getEye().m_y,m_cam->getEye().m_z));
00539     }
00540     if(m_cam->getEye().m_z> cameraLimitZ)
00541     {
00542         m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec3(m_cam->getEye().m_x,m_cam->getEye().m_y,cameraLimitZ));
00543     }
00544     if(m_cam->getEye().m_z< -cameraLimitZ)
00545     {
00546         m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec3(m_cam->getEye().m_x,m_cam->getEye().m_y,-cameraLimitZ));
00547     }
00548   }
00549 
00550   //Sets the squad size to the amount selected on the slider
00551   if (m_sliderSquadSize->getIsSliding() == true)
00552   {
00553     m_squadSize = m_sliderSquadSize->slideBar(_event.x);
00554     m_ss.str(std::string());
00555     m_ss << m_squadSize;
00556     m_squadSizeString = m_ss.str();
00557     m_sliderSquadSize->setTextString(m_squadSizeString);  
00558   }
00559 
00560 }
00561 
00562 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00563 void NGLDraw::mousePressEvent (const SDL_MouseButtonEvent &_event)
00564 {
00565   // this method is called when the mouse button is pressed in this case we
00566   // store the value where the maouse was clicked (x,y) and set the Rotate flag to true
00567     if(m_gameState != gameMenu && _event.button == SDL_BUTTON_MIDDLE)
00568     {
00569       m_origXPos = _event.x;
00570       m_origYPos = _event.y;
00571       m_translate=true;
00572     }
00573 
00574     if(_event.button == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT)
00575     {
00576       unsigned int numberOfButtons = m_buttons.size();
00577       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfButtons; i++)
00578       {
00579         if (m_buttons[i]->isClicked(_event.x, _event.y) && m_buttons[i]->getIsActive() == true)
00580         {
00581           switch (m_buttons[i]->getName())
00582           {
00583             case buttonPlay:
00584             {
00585               startGame(m_selectedLevel);
00586               m_gameState = gamePlay;
00587               m_buttonQuit->setIsActive(false);
00588               m_buttonLevel1->setIsActive(false);
00589               m_buttonLevel2->setIsActive(false);
00590               m_buttonLevel3->setIsActive(false);
00591               m_buttonLevel4->setIsActive(false);
00592               m_buttonLevel5->setIsActive(false);
00593               m_buttonPlay->setIsActive(false);
00594               m_buttonPause->setIsActive(true);
00595               m_buttonMenu->setIsActive(true);
00596               m_sliderSquadSize->setIsActive(true);
00597               m_buttonCreateSquad->setIsActive(true);
00598               break;
00599             }
00600             case buttonLevel1 :
00601             {
00602               m_selectedLevel = 1;
00603               break;
00604             }
00605             case buttonLevel2 :
00606             {
00607               m_selectedLevel = 2;
00608               break;
00609             }
00610             case buttonLevel3 :
00611             {
00612               m_selectedLevel = 3;
00613               break;
00614             }
00615             case buttonLevel4 :
00616             {
00617               m_selectedLevel = 4;
00618               break;
00619             }
00620             case buttonLevel5 :
00621             {
00622               m_selectedLevel = 5;
00623               break;
00624             }
00625             case buttonQuit :
00626             {
00627               m_gameState = gameQuit;
00628               break;
00629             }
00630             case buttonPause :
00631             {
00632               if (m_gameState == gamePlay)
00633               {
00634                 m_gameState = gamePause;
00635                 m_gameTimer.resetTimer();
00636                 m_buttonPause->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.9f, 0.95f), ngl::Vec2(0.2f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00637                 m_buttonPause->updateText("Play", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-32.f, -17.f));
00638                 m_sliderSquadSize->setIsActive(false);
00639                 m_buttonCreateSquad->setIsActive(false);
00640                 break;
00641               }
00642               else if (m_gameState == gamePause)
00643               {
00644                 m_gameState = gamePlay;
00645                 m_gameTimer.resetTimer();
00646                 m_buttonPause->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.9f, 0.95f), ngl::Vec2(0.2f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00647                 m_buttonPause->updateText("Pause", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-52.f, -17.f));
00648                 m_sliderSquadSize->setIsActive(true);
00649                 m_buttonCreateSquad->setIsActive(true);
00650                 break;
00651               }
00652               break;
00653             }
00654             case buttonMenu :
00655             {
00656               m_gameState = gameMenu;
00657 
00658               endGame();
00659               m_buttonQuit->setIsActive(true);
00660               m_buttonPlay->setIsActive(true);
00661               m_buttonMenu->setIsActive(false);
00662               m_buttonPause->setIsActive(false);
00663               m_sliderSquadSize->setIsActive(false);
00664               m_buttonCreateSquad->setIsActive(false);
00665               m_buttonLevel1->setIsActive(true);
00666               m_buttonLevel2->setIsActive(true);
00667               m_buttonLevel3->setIsActive(true);
00668               m_buttonLevel4->setIsActive(true);
00669               m_buttonLevel5->setIsActive(true);
00670               break;
00671 
00672             }
00673             case buttonCreateSquad :
00674             {
00675               m_gameworld->createSquad(m_squadSize);
00676               break;
00677             }
00678             case buttonSquadPatrol :
00679             {
00680               m_selectedSquad->setSquadState("patrol", squadPatrol);
00681               m_selectedSquad->setSquadColour(m_patrolColour);
00682               m_selectedSquad->setSquadSelectedColour(m_patrolColour*2.0);
00683               break;
00684             }
00685             case buttonSquadAggressive :
00686             {
00687               m_selectedSquad->setSquadState("aggressive", squadAggressive);
00688               m_selectedSquad->setSquadColour(m_aggressiveColour);
00689               m_selectedSquad->setSquadSelectedColour(m_aggressiveColour*2.0);
00690               break;
00691             }
00692             case buttonSquadDefensive :
00693             {
00694               m_selectedSquad->setSquadState("defensive", squadDefensive);
00695               m_selectedSquad->setSquadColour(m_defensiveColour);
00696               m_selectedSquad->setSquadSelectedColour(m_defensiveColour*2.0);
00697               break;
00698             }
00699             case buttonSquadWall :
00700             {
00701               m_selectedSquad->setSquadState("wall", squadWall);
00702               m_selectedSquad->setSquadColour(m_wallColour);
00703               m_selectedSquad->setSquadSelectedColour(m_wallColour*2.0);
00704               break;
00705             }
00706             default:
00707             {
00708               break;
00709             }
00710 
00711           }
00712           return;
00713         }
00714       }
00715       if (m_sliderSquadSize->isClicked(_event.x, _event.y) && m_sliderSquadSize->getIsActive() == true)
00716       {
00717         m_sliderSquadSize->setIsSliding(true);
00718         m_squadSize = m_sliderSquadSize->slideBar(_event.x);
00719         m_ss.str(std::string());
00720         m_ss << m_squadSize;
00721         m_squadSizeString = m_ss.str();
00722         m_sliderSquadSize->setTextString(m_squadSizeString);
00723         return;
00724       }
00725 
00726       if (m_gameState == gamePlay)
00727       {
00728          doSelection(_event.x, _event.y);
00729       }
00730     }
00731     if(_event.button == SDL_BUTTON_RIGHT)
00732     {
00733         if (m_gameState == gamePlay)
00734         {
00735 
00736            if (m_selected)
00737            {
00738                m_selectedSquad->setSquadDrawColour(m_selectedSquad->getSquadColour());
00739 
00740                m_selected = false;
00741                m_selectedSquad = NULL;
00742                m_selectedSquadID = -1;
00743            }
00744 
00745         }
00746     }
00747 }
00748 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00749 void NGLDraw::mouseReleaseEvent (const SDL_MouseButtonEvent &_event)
00750 {
00751   // this event is called when the mouse button is released
00752   // we then set Rotate to false
00753   if (_event.button == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT)
00754   {
00755     m_sliderSquadSize->setIsSliding(false);
00756     m_rotate=false;
00757   }
00758   // right mouse translate mode
00759   if (m_gameState != gameMenu && _event.button == SDL_BUTTON_MIDDLE)
00760   {
00761     m_translate=false;
00762   }
00763 }
00764 
00765 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00766 void NGLDraw::wheelEvent(const SDL_MouseWheelEvent &_event)
00767 {
00768 
00769   // check the diff of the wheel position (0 means no change)
00770   if(_event.y > 0)
00771   {
00772       m_modelPos.m_y+=(ZOOM*(cameraHeight-m_modelPos.m_y)*0.05);
00773 
00774       float nearest = 15.0;
00775 
00776       if(cameraHeight-m_modelPos.m_y < nearest)
00777       {
00778         m_modelPos.m_y = cameraHeight - nearest;
00779       }
00780   }
00781   else if(_event.y < 0)
00782   {
00783       m_modelPos.m_y-=(ZOOM*(cameraHeight-m_modelPos.m_y)*0.05);
00784 
00785       float furthest = ((49.0*5000.0)/(m_longestSide));
00786 
00787       if(cameraHeight-m_modelPos.m_y > furthest)
00788       {
00789         m_modelPos.m_y= cameraHeight - furthest;
00790       }
00791   }
00792 
00793 
00794 }
00795 
00796 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00797 void NGLDraw::doSelection(const int _x, const int _y)
00798 {
00799   glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00800 
00801   int numberOfSquads = m_gameworld->getSquads().size();
00802   for(int i=0; i < numberOfSquads; i++)
00803   {
00804     Squad* currentSquad = m_gameworld->getSquads()[i];
00805 
00806     currentSquad->selectionDraw(m_cam, m_mouseGlobalTX);
00807 
00808     currentSquad->setSquadDrawColour(currentSquad->getSquadColour());
00809 
00810   }
00811 
00812   ngl::Vec3 pixel;
00813 
00814   GLint viewport[4];
00815   glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, viewport);
00816 
00817   glReadPixels(_x, viewport[3] - _y , 1, 1, GL_RGB, GL_FLOAT, &pixel);
00818 
00819   bool newSelection = false;
00820 
00821   for(int i=0; i < numberOfSquads; i++)
00822   {
00823     Squad* currentSquad = m_gameworld->getSquads()[i];
00824 
00825     if(currentSquad->checkSelectionColour(pixel) == true)
00826     {
00827       currentSquad->setSquadDrawColour(currentSquad->getSquadSelectedColour());
00828       //set selected squad colour
00829       if(m_selected == true)
00830       {
00831         m_selected = true;
00832         m_selectedSquad = currentSquad;
00833         m_selectedSquadID = currentSquad->getID();
00834         newSelection = true;
00835         break;
00836       }
00837       else
00838       {
00839         m_selected = true;
00840         m_selectedSquad = currentSquad;
00841         m_selectedSquadID = currentSquad->getID();
00842         newSelection = true;
00843         break;
00844       }
00845     }
00846 
00847   }
00848 
00849   if(newSelection == false && m_selected == true)
00850   {
00851     doMovement(_x, _y);
00852     m_selected = false;
00853     m_selectedSquad= NULL;
00854   }
00855 
00856 
00857   glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00858 
00859 }
00860 
00861 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00862 void NGLDraw::doMovement(const int _x, const int _y)
00863 {
00864     std::map<int, BaseGameEntity*>::const_iterator entity = m_entityMgr->getEntityMap().find(m_selectedSquadID);
00865 
00866     if(entity->first !=  m_entityMgr->getEntityMap().end()->first)
00867     {
00868         m_clickPosition = getWorldSpace(_x, _y);
00869 
00870         m_gameworld->squadTarget(m_selectedSquad, m_clickPosition);
00871         m_selected =false;
00872     }
00873 }
00874 
00875 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00876 ngl::Vec3 NGLDraw::getWorldSpace(const int _x, const int _y)
00877 {
00878 
00879     ngl::Mat4 m;
00880     m = m*m_mouseGlobalTX;
00881     ngl::Mat4 t=m_cam->getProjectionMatrix();
00882     ngl::Mat4 v=m_cam->getViewMatrix();
00883 
00884     // as ngl:: and OpenGL use different formats need to transpose the matrix.
00885     t.transpose();
00886     v.transpose();
00887     m.transpose();
00888     ngl::Mat4 inverse=(t*v*m).inverse();
00889 
00890     ngl::Vec4 tmp(0,0,-1.0f,1.0f);
00891     // convert into NDC
00892     tmp.m_x=(2.0f * _x) / m_width- 1.0f;
00893     tmp.m_y=1.0f - (2.0f * _y) / m_height;
00894     // scale by inverse MV * Project transform
00895 
00896     ngl::Vec4 near(tmp.m_x,tmp.m_y,-1.0f,1.0f);
00897     ngl::Vec4 far(tmp.m_x,tmp.m_y,1.0f,1.0f);
00898     //get world point on near and far clipping planes
00899     ngl::Vec4 obj_near=inverse*near;
00900     ngl::Vec4 obj_far=inverse*far;
00901 
00902     // Scale by w
00903     obj_near/=obj_near.m_w;
00904     obj_far/=obj_far.m_w;
00905 
00906     ngl::Vec3 nearPoint(obj_near.m_x,obj_near.m_y,obj_near.m_z);
00907     ngl::Vec3 farPoint(obj_far.m_x,obj_far.m_y,obj_far.m_z);
00908 
00909     //create ray
00910     ngl::Vec3 rayDir(farPoint-nearPoint);
00911     if(rayDir.lengthSquared() == 0.0f)
00912     {
00913         std::cout<<"Ray Direction in getWorldSpace equals zero, can't normalise"<<std::endl;
00914     }
00915     else
00916     {
00917         rayDir.normalize();
00918     }
00919 
00920     //calculate distance to zx plane
00921     float dist = (-nearPoint.m_y)/rayDir.m_y;
00922 
00923     //set world space coordinate where y = 0
00924     ngl::Vec3 obj(nearPoint.m_x + (dist*rayDir.m_x),nearPoint.m_y + (dist*rayDir.m_y),nearPoint.m_z + (dist*rayDir.m_z));
00925 
00926     obj.m_y = 0.0;
00927 
00928     return obj;
00929 }
00930 
00931 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00932 void NGLDraw::initialiseUI()
00933 {
00934   m_textSmall = new Text("font/arial.ttf", 20);
00935   m_textMedium = new Text("font/arial.ttf", 40);
00936   m_textLarge = new Text("font/arial.ttf", 60);
00937

00939   m_buttonPlay->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec2(0.5f, 0.2f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00940   m_buttonPlay->updateText("New Game", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-98.f, -25.f));
00941   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonPlay);
00942

00944   m_buttonLevel1->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(-0.2f, -0.1f), ngl::Vec2(0.1f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.4f, 1.f));
00945   m_buttonLevel1->updateText("1", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-9.f, -17.f));
00946   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonLevel1);
00947

00949   m_buttonLevel2->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(-0.1f, -0.1f), ngl::Vec2(0.1f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00950   m_buttonLevel2->updateText("2", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-9.f, -17.f));
00951   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonLevel2);

00955   m_buttonLevel3->updateText("3", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-9.f, -17.f));
00956   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonLevel3);

00960   m_buttonLevel4->updateText("4", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-9.f, -17.f));

00964   m_buttonLevel5->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.2f, -0.1f), ngl::Vec2(0.1f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00965   m_buttonLevel5->updateText("5", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-9.f, -17.f));
00966   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonLevel5);
00967 
00968   m_buttonQuit = new UIButton(buttonQuit,  "font/arial.ttf", 40, ngl::Vec2(m_width, m_height));
00969   m_buttonQuit->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.f, -0.3f), ngl::Vec2(0.5f, 0.2f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00970   m_buttonQuit->updateText("Quit", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-40.f, -25.f));
00971   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonQuit);
00972 
00973   m_buttonPause = new UIButton(buttonPause, "font/arial.ttf", 40, ngl::Vec2(m_width, m_height));
00974   m_buttonPause->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.9f, 0.95f), ngl::Vec2(0.2f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00975   m_buttonPause->updateText("Pause", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-52.f, -25.f));
00976   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonPause);
00977

00979   m_buttonMenu->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.9f, 0.83f), ngl::Vec2(0.2f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00980   m_buttonMenu->updateText("Menu", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-52.f, -25.f));
00981   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonMenu);

00984   m_buttonCreateSquad->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.f, -0.9f), ngl::Vec2(0.3f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00985   m_buttonCreateSquad->updateText("Create Squad", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-60.f, -13.f));
00986   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonCreateSquad);

00989   m_buttonSquadPatrol->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.7f, -0.9f), ngl::Vec2(0.1f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
00990   m_buttonSquadPatrol->updateText("Patr", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-20.f, -13.f));
00991   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonSquadPatrol);

00995   m_buttonSquadAggressive->updateText("Aggr", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-20.f, -13.f));
00996   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonSquadAggressive);

00999   m_buttonSquadDefensive->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.6f, -0.9f), ngl::Vec2(0.1f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
01000   m_buttonSquadDefensive->updateText("Def", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-20.f, -13.f));
01001   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonSquadDefensive);

01004   m_buttonSquadWall->updateButton(ngl::Vec2(0.4f, -0.9f), ngl::Vec2(0.1f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f));
01005   m_buttonSquadWall->updateText("Wall", ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-20.f, -13.f));
01006   m_buttons.push_back(m_buttonSquadWall);
01007

01017 
01018   m_sliderSquadSize = new UISlider(sliderSquadSize, "font/arial.ttf", 40, ngl::Vec2(m_width, m_height));
01019   m_sliderSquadSize->updateSlider(ngl::Vec2(-0.5f, -0.9f), ngl::Vec2(0.5f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.9f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(-0.5f, -0.9f), ngl::Vec2(0.02f, 0.1f), ngl::Vec4(1.f, 1.f, 1.f, 1.f), 3, 9);
01020   m_squadSize = m_sliderSquadSize->calculateOutput();
01021   m_ss.str(std::string());
01022   m_ss << m_squadSize;
01023   m_squadSizeString = m_ss.str();
01024   m_sliderSquadSize->updateText(m_squadSizeString, ngl::Vec3(1.f, 1.f, 1.f), ngl::Vec2(177.f, -27.f));
